title: Adc Main Lf
body:
Hi !
Im Looking for a Team where i can improve a bit 
Im currently Gold 1 with 67% and Good MMR

My Strengts are :
Kiting very good and clean
2v2 Playstyle very nice
Agressiv player
Good Game knowledge

My weakness:
Csing is average 60-70 At min 10 / 130-150 Min 20 'Meh'
Mapawerness
tilting sometimes (only in Soloq) 

I have alot of time so i Wouldve happy if i could join a team :)
My languge are : switzerlandish,Englisch, and a bit german aswell lol :D
i can handle even 5 times a week

Ps: last time i played in season 6 i was d2 there 
now G1 and im pretty sure soon platin
gl hf pls no hate
